接口 FloraCorePlugin

  • 所有已知实现类:

    public interface FloraCorePlugin

      • getStorage

        Storage getStorage()
        Gets the primary data storage instance. This is likely to be wrapped with extra layers for caching, etc.
        返回:
        the storage handler instance
